field.description: Upload and query system for Soundscape server.

function.name: uploadLocation
function.description: Upload a location for a session id.

parameter.name: sessionId
parameter.description: Identifies the session to which the timestamp should be added.

parameter.name: timestamp
parameter.description: Represents the time when the location was recorded.

parameter.name: timestamp
parameter.description: Represents the time when the location was recorded.
